p: Due to necessary treatment of TB infection, L. officinale essential oil was tested against MDR-TB. Results showed that L. officinale essential oil was relatively active on MDR-TB with MIC = 252 μg/ml. In this situation, MIC of isoniazid as pure compound and drug standard was equal to 4 μg/ml. It is notable that, the standard breakpoint value of isoniazid against MTB is equal to 2 μg/ml.
